tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE spare_parts_inventory (
    part_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    part_name VARCHAR(255),
    part_category VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    supplier_id INT,
    location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  part_id INT,
  quantity INT,
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (part_id) REFERENCES parts(part_id)
);

CREATE TABLE VehicleInventory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    part_name VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE VehicleDetails (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    make VARCHAR(50),
    model VARCHAR(50),
    year INT
)

CREATE TABLE Supplier (
    supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(50),
    contact_person VARCHAR(50),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE PurchaseHistory (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    part_name VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    purchase_date DATE
)
CREATE TABLE vehicles (vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY, vehicle_name VARCHAR(100), vehicle_type VARCHAR(50), manufacturing_year INT, last_maintenance_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE spare_parts (part_id INT PRIMARY KEY, part_name VARCHAR(100), part_description TEXT, part_quantity INT, part_supplier VARCHAR(100));
CREATE TABLE supplies (supply_id INT PRIMARY KEY, supply_name VARCHAR(100), supply_category VARCHAR(50), supply_quantity INT, supply_unit VARCHAR(20));
CREATE TABLE vehicle_parts_association (vehicle_id INT, part_id INT, quantity_used INT, PRIMARY KEY (vehicle_id, part_id));
CREATE TABLE vehicle_supplies_association (vehicle_id INT, supply_id INT, quantity_used INT, PRIMARY KEY (vehicle_id, supply_id));
